content.description: Start sitting on boulder from far side of chossy, traverse for 20' to top out just before agave plant
content.location: on the chossy backside of the boulder

content.description: I haven't played on it much so I can't give a lot of beta, if you work it out please shoot me a PM and I'll put it up and give you credit for it.
content.location: As you come up on Chossy when you pass Marble Cake this is the section you will be looking at before you climb up to the front side or walk around to the back side.

content.description:
begin with a left crimp and a small, sharp right undercling. shoulder into a slopey undercling-pinch, and get set up to go to one of the three block features high off of the ground.  

  no idea about the grade.
content.location: left arete on the overhanging and bulgy face seen when walking up the canyon from the road. the slab climbs are past this face, and around the corner.

content.description:
Go straight up starting in the crack half way up the center of the front side that cuts over to the right.  It has a very thin start up to a pretty solid hold about 2/3 of the way up the center. 

  If you want beta on this one, there is a left and right hand in the crack that will do the job.  You have a fairly solid left foot and two options for the right, the higher of the two is smaller but bites better.  from there you will barn door if you go for the next right hand hold first so you need to pull the side pinch left, then the right out a little way and up with the left to the huge hold.
Start matched on the rail in the cave to the right of "Wet dog".  Work your way into the fist jams leading out of the cave.
content.location: Right of Wet Dog on the Chossy boulder

content.description: This is a small fairly water polished crack on the right front side of Chossy.  It has a pretty tough start with holds getting better the higher up you go.
content.protection: Soft landing for the most part so a pad and a spotter to keep you off the rock to the right.
content.location: I will get the topo up for this first chance I get.

content.description:
ATTENTION  There is a large loose chunk that's a serious temptation to pull on, I will clean it next time I'm up here but the back side of this is still in need of some work so you have been warned.

  Around the back side on the left there is a pretty easy climb that starts with a sit start and your hands in the two pockets, you have hands on either side from there and you can work the top out as you see fit as there are no shortages of holds up there.
This is on the front face of Chossy, with a start on the large boulder to the left and the same topout as receding hairline.
content.protection: I would say go heavy on the pads, you have some solid holds but the fall/landing wouldn't be pretty.

content.description: This boulder is on the right side of the canyon just to the right of Marble Cake, there look to be some problems on the back side of it though there are some fairly large loose rocks that will need to be cleaned before this is a safe spot to boulder.
